About us

Software

Chorus2

Oligo FISH probe design software.

CRISPR-BETS

gRNA design software for base editing knockout system.

CRISPRMatch

An automatic calculation and visualization tool for high-throughput CRISPR genome-editing data analysis.

Popera

DHS identification software.
